hero.heading: Sliding & Folding
hero.copy: If you’re looking to save space and add style, these sliding and folding doors offer form and function.
hero.direction: See your sliding and folding door options

inspiration.heading: Sliding/Bypass
copy: When it comes to space-saving minimalism, these doors will keep you on track. Two doors slide past each other on a quiet track system that’s easy to install.

small.alt: Jeld-Wen Moda White Pocket Hallway Door Sliding

inspiration.heading: Bi-fold closet
copy: Perfect for closets, laundry rooms and any room that’s subtly tucked away, these narrow doors fold up on a track when open, using less space than a traditional hinged door.

next.heading: Next, let’s go over specialty doors.
next.copy: These distinctive, space-saving door types are a great way to give your place a little character.
